description:
With a brand new and exclusive Vertical “Tate” Mode for Nintendo Switch™, SkyScrappers is a 1-4 player arcade-style, competitive platform-fighting game.

Select from a diverse range of extreme sportspeople, to fight and race your way to the top of a falling skyscraper… as it is being demolished.    

Play with up to four players in classic couch-multiplayer, take on the story-driven single-player campaigns, or set up a skirmish against AI bots.

Features:

* Classic arcade feel and style
* Breath-taking hand drawn artwork
* Skill-based gameplay
* Exclusive Vertical “Tate” Mode
* 1-4 player local multiplayer
* Single player story mode
name: SkyScrappers
